name: Muff + Drutt
overview: Compilation of two previously unreleased Arkanoid style games:- 1) Muff is classic Arkanoid clone. The player's task is to destroy the wall on the left side of the screen. The player can pick up bonus arrows that contain various positive or negative extras. 2) Drutt is designed for two players. Each player handles simultaneously vertical and horizontal paddle. The winner is the one who will make the opponent not rebound the ball.
